A Jovita le agrada mucho trabajar en la chacra, por eso que sus anhelos de progreso los tiene puestos en la agricultura. Este es su tercer crédito con MFP, donde hace compromisos de seguir trabajando con el mismo dinamismo como hasta ahora lo viene haciendo, y en su banco comunal está muy contenta, sobre todo porque le permite ahorrar su dinero. Los 1300 soles que solicita los usará en la compra de fertilizantes químicos para abonar su chacra de papas, mientras que en la chacra donde Jovita se tomó la foto, sembrará arvejas
texts.en:
Jovita is 40 years old and lives in her own home with her husband, who is the father of her four children. Of those four, the youngest two still attend the local school. She and her husband work as day laborers on the small farms of their neighbors, and, in small quantities, harvest their own crops like potatoes, peas and yams. She sees it as her obligation to wake up at sun rise to have time to prepare food and starts her work usually at 8 a.m., where they pay her 12 soles a day and her husband 15. In this way they are able to feed their children. She cultivates her own crops only when she has time, so she only harvests them once every six to eight months. Meanwhile, she labors arduously on the fields she's hired to work on.

However, now the couple is proposing a change in their lives. They want to focus more on their own land and produce their crops in higher quantities and of top quality. Jovita really enjoys working in her fields, so one of her goals of progress is expanding them. This is her third loan with Kiva partner MFP, and she promises to keep working hard with the same energy she that has taken her to this point. She is very satisfied with her community bank, above all because it helps her save money. She plans to use the 1300 soles she is requesting to purchase chemical fertilizers to enrich her potato fields. Meanwhile, in the field where Jovita took the photo, she will plant peas.

Translated from Spanish by Marty Greenstein, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase fertilizers

loans.name: Loveth

texts.en:
Loveth P. sells provisions, drinks and foodstuffs. She is 39 years old and married with three children. 

She hopes for a loan of N70,000 (US$500) to purchase more provisions and drinks to sell. She says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more provisions and drinks to sell

loans.name: Mariela

texts.es: Mariela tiene 28 años, es una madre soltera muy emprendedora y responsable, vive en su casa propia con su pequeño y único hijo varón, que es la razón de su trabajo. Se dedica a la venta de comestibles de primera necesidad, en un espacio que acondicionó en su vivienda; diariamente madruga para que cuando el reloj marca a las 6.00am es posible encontrarla en su bodeguita ofreciendo los panes calientes, y sonriente, conversando con sus clientes, ya que es eso, lo que más le gusta de su negocio. A Mariela le gustaría ampliar el espacio de su tienda para darles mayor comodidad a sus clientes, y a la vez incrementar la cantidad de productos que vende, pero por el momento lo ve difícil, debido a la carencia económica, además no cuenta con el espacio suficiente. Son 5 años los que lleva en este negocio, y está muy acostumbrada con cada uno de sus clientes, siente que ya es hora de crecer y mejorar el servicio, para mejorar sus ganancias, y con ello su calidad de vida. Este es el tercer préstamo que tiene con MFP, durante los anteriores créditos demostró ser una cliente muy puntual en sus pagos. Asimismo, en su cargo como tesorera de su banco comunal, ya que en todas las reuniones es la encargada de realizar las cobranzas. Los mil quinientos soles que solicita los invertirá en la compra de mercadería, y de ser posible comprará planchas de madera para realizar una división en su casa, con la idea de agrandar el espacio de su bodega.
texts.en:
Mariela is a 28-year-old enterprising and responsible single mother. She lives in her own home with her small son, her only child and the reason why she works. Mariela makes a living selling grocery products of primary need in a space she set up in her home. She rises at dawn every day and at the stroke of 6 a.m. it's possible to find her in her small bodega offering hot breads and smiling and conversing with her customers, which is what she most enjoys about her business. Mariela would like to enlarge her store in order to offer more convenience to her customers as well as increase the number of products she sells. But at the moment this is difficult due to the faltering economy, and furthermore she doesn't have sufficient space. She has had the business for five years and is very familiar with every one of her clients. She feels that now is the time to grow and improve her service in order to generate more income and with it a better quality of life. This is her third loan with Kiva partner MFP, and in her previous loans she showed herself to be very punctual with her payments. Likewise, she is the treasurer of her community bank and at all the meetings she is in charge of the collections. With the 1500 soles she is requesting she plans to invest in the purchase of merchandise and, if possible, buy wooden planks to set up a division in her home, with the goal of enlarging the space of her store.

Translated from Spanish by Marty Greenstein, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase inventory and buy planks to put up a division in her home to enlarge her store.

loans.name: Maximo

texts.es: Máximo tiene 51 años, está casado con la madre de sus 6 hijos; de los cuales, los 2 menores, aun están estudiando y viven con ellos. Durante 31 años se ha dedicado a la agricultura y a la crianza de ganado vacuno, aunque en algunos momentos tiene que priorizar sus labores en la chacra, no descuida del cuidado de sus animales, los cuales son su herramienta de trabajo, con los que brinda el servicio de arado a sus vecinos, cobrando entre 50 y 60 soles por chacra. Por esta razón, no se descuida de sembrar la avena, que es el alimento primordial de sus toros. Los meses de noviembre a enero son época donde se preparan las tierras temporales para la siembra, y es cuando Máximo y sus toros tienen mayor trabajo. El resto del año, se dedica a trabajar en sus propios cultivos, que finalmente comercializa en el mercado de la ciudad de Tarma. Máximo está muy contento con los trabajos que viene realizando, ya que gracias a estas actividades pudo educar a cada uno de sus hijos. Este es su tercer préstamo con MFP, y durante este tiempo demostró ser un cliente muy puntual en cada uno de sus pagos. Los dos mil soles que solicita los invertirá en la compra de semillas de avena, para sembrarlas y alimentar a sus toros, con el resto del dinero comprará fertilizantes para el abonado de su chacra de papas.
texts.en:
Máximo is 51 years old and married to the mother of his six children, the youngest two of which are still in school and live with them. For the past 31 years he has made a living in agricultural and raising cattle. Although sometimes he had to prioritize his labors in the fields, he never neglected his animals, which are his working tools with which he provides plowing services to his neighbors at 50 to 60 soles per field. For this reason he never neglects to plants oats, which is the primary food for his cattle. Between November and January is the time when fields are prepared for planting, and it's when Máximo and his cattle have the majority of their work. He dedicates himself to his crops the remainder of the year and eventually sells them at the market in the city of Tarma. Máximo is very satisfied with the work he carries out, since thanks to these activities he was able to educate every one of his six children. This is his third loan with Kiva partner MFP and during this time he has shown himself to be very punctual with each of his payments. With the 2000 soles he's requesting, he plans to invest in the purchase of oat seeds to harvest and feed his cattle. He will purchase fertilizer to enrich his potato fields with the rest of the money.

Translated from Spanish by Marty Greenstein, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase oat seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Modesto

texts.es: Modesto tiene 59 años, es un padre muy abnegado, vive en su casa propia en compañía de su esposa, quien es la madre de sus 5 hijos, de los cuales, todos viven fuera; pero ahora están a cargo de sus nietas, hijas de su hija mayor, quien se fue, dejándolas en su casa. Cuando sus hijos eran pequeños Modesto tenía una bodega muy bien surtida, debido al amor que le tenía a su hija mayor, la dejó a cargo de la administración de este negocio, pero ella no supo valorar la confianza depositada, despilfarrado el dinero y llevando a la quiebra la bodega. Desde entonces, Modesto comenzó a vender condimentos molidos y verduras, mientras que su esposa cocina para los comensales a quienes les vende el almuerzo diariamente, donde Modesto es el encargado de la atención. También tiene algunos cultivos a los que se dedica por las tardes, pero lo que más le gusta es el comercio, ya que durante su vida de negociante acumuló muy buenas ganancias. Por ello, trabaja con mucho empeño brindando un buen trato a sus clientes, tanto a los que le compran verduras, como a los comensales de su esposa, de quienes depende su progreso, nos dice. Este es el tercer préstamo que tiene con MFP, durante los dos periodos concluidos demostró responsabilidad en cada uno de sus pagos, del mismo modo, se compromete a seguir cumpliendo así. Cabe resaltar que Modesto es un hombre muy noble, de buen carácter y generoso, en cada reunión de su banco comunal siempre suele estar de sueño, de lo cual todos sus compañeros le bromean y él nunca demuestra enojo. El dinero que solicita es para incrementar su mercadería, con ello piensa comprar más productos comestibles de primera necesidad, para sacar a flote nuevamente su bodega.
texts.en:
Modesto is 59 years old, a very unselfish father, and lives in his own house with his wife, who is the mother of his five children, all of whom live outside the house. However, they are take care of his granddaughters, the children of their oldest daughter, who has left them. When their children were young, Modesto had a successful shop. Because of his love for his oldest daughter, he left her in charge of managing the shop. However, she did not know the value of the confidence he instilled in her and she squandered the money and drove the shop into bankruptcy. Subsequently, Modesto began selling powdered spices and vegetables. His wife cooks for diners whom they sell lunch to daily and Modesto is in charge of taking care of their customers. He also does some farming in the afternoons. However, what he is most interested in is running a business, since during his life as a business man he has been able to make a good living. He works very hard and treats his clients well, so much so that they have told us about it. This is his third loan with MFP. During his previous loans he has demonstrated responsibility and been on time with each of his payments. They highlight that Modesto is a very noble man of good character and is generous. At each of the community bank meetings he always appears to be asleep and his friends joke around with him but never gets upset. The money from the loan will be used to increase his inventory. He will be able to purchase more foodstuffs and will be able to make his business profitable once again.

Translated from Spanish by Matthew Raimondi, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase his inventory

loans.name: Roberta

texts.es: Roberta acaba de cumplir 47 años, es una madre trabajadora y responsable, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo e hijos. Tiene 9, de los cuales, 4 de ellos viven fuera, mientras los otros 5 están con ella, y son el motivo de sus esfuerzos. Se dedica a la compra, crianza y venta de cerdos, se levanta muy temprano para alimentarlos y que estén muy gorditos para comercializarlos, por lo que los cuida con mucho cariño y esmero, puesto que sabe que gracias a ellos, tendrá el dinero para los gastos familiares. Su  esposo es agricultor, y en horas de la tarde, cuando Roberta pastea sus cerdos, también lo apoya en los trabajos agrícolas. Los 8 años que lleva en este negocio le han dado la experiencia necesaria para realizar un buen trabajo; y lo que más le gusta es que al mismo tiempo que cuida de sus animales, también puede realizar sus labores hogareñas. Pero considera que lo más difícil es evitar que sus cerdos se vayan lejos y se pierdan, por lo que sobre todo, tiene mucho más cuidado de los pequeñitos, con los que decidió tomarse la foto. Este es su tercer crédito con MFP, durante sus anteriores préstamos consecutivos ha demostrado ser una cliente muy responsable en cada uno de sus pagos, y del mismo modo se compromete a seguir trabajando con su banco comunal. Con los dos mil soles que ha solicitado quiere incrementar la cantidad de sus porcinos, además de comprar fertilizantes químicos para los cultivos de su esposo.
texts.en:
Roberta just turned 47 years old. She is a working mother and responsible. She lives in her own house with her husband and children. She has 9 children, 4 of which live elsewhere and 5 with her. They are the reason behind her efforts. She works buying, raising and selling pigs. She gets up very early to feed them and fatten them for market. She cares for them with affection since she knows that she will have money for family expenses thanks to them. Her husband is a farmer and she helps him in the afternoon hours when the pigs are grazing. Her eight years in this business have given her the necessary experience to do a good job. What she likes best about it is that she can do her household chores at the same time she is caring for her animals. She thinks the most difficult part is to make sure her pigs don’t go far away and get lost. Above all she is very careful with the little ones. She decided to have her picture taken with them. This is her third loan with MFP. She has proven to be a very responsible client with each payment of her previous consecutive loans. She is committed to continue working with her community bank in the same way. She wants to increase the amount of pigs with the loan of two thousand PEN she has applied for and also buy chemical fertilizers for her husband’s crops.

Translated from Spanish by Susan Haynes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase pigs and fertilizers

loans.name: Yetunde

texts.en:
Yetunde is 40 years old and married with six children. She has a welding shop, but she hopes to start a timber business.

She is the only woman standing between the men in the picture. She hopes for a loan of N70,000 (US$500) to purchase timber to sell. She says thank you to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase timber to sell.

loans.name: Maureen

texts.en: Maureen is 39 years old and married with two children. She sells provisions and drinks to make a living. Maureen is requesting the loan amount of 140,000 NGN to purchase more stock to sell. She sends her thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more provisions and drinks to sell

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es: Santiago tiene 50 años de edad, vive con la madre de sus 5 hijos, de los cuales, 3 de ellos migraron a otras ciudades, y ahora se ha quedado con los 2 menores, quienes son el motivo de su trabajo. Se levanta muy temprano para rajar la leña con la que su esposa prepara los alimentos de día, en seguida acude a realizar los trabajos agrícolas, sembrando en mayor cantidad papa. En estos años de agricultor pudo aprender los gajes del oficio, por ello, en cada una de sus cosechas no pierde, sólo a veces aminora su producción debido a la tierra pobre, por falta de fertilizantes. Pero, para ello, Santiago se preocupa en abonar sus plantas las veces que se requiera, para lograr cosechas abundantes, ya que tiene 5 hectáreas de terreno, donde ahora tiene sembrada papa por cosechar, las cuales piensa negociar en los mercados de la ciudad de Lima para acumular mayores ganancias, y con ellas incrementar y variar sus cultivos con la siembra de arvejas, ya que la considera muy rentable también. Santiago está muy feliz con el trabajo que realiza, por lo que tiene planes a futuro, de seguir incrementado con sus tierras. Durante tres prestamos consecutivos viene trabajando con MFP, y no ha tenido problemas de pago, de lo contrario, en alguna fechas ha precancelado su crédito, y para este ciclo se compromete a seguir trabajando del mismo modo. Los mil quinientos soles que viene solicitando los va a derivar a la compra de fertilizantes químicos, para que pueda abonar los meses necesarios para sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Santiago is 50 years old. He lives with his mother and 5 children. Three of them migrated to other cities and now he is left with the 2 youngest. They are the reason for his work. He gets up very early to chop up the fire wood his wife uses to prepare their daily food and then he goes to do his farming chores. He mainly grows potatoes. He has learned the tricks of the trade in these years as a farmer so he doesn’t lose anything in any of his crops. Sometimes his production is reduced due to the poor soil from lack of fertilizers. Santiago takes care to fertilize his plants as many times as needed to obtain abundant harvests since he has 5 hectares of land. Now he has potatoes to harvest which he hopes to trade in the markets of Lima to gain a better profit. He wants to increase and vary his crops by planting peas which he thinks are very profitable also. Santiago is very happy with the work he does. He plans to continue growing with his land in the future. He has worked with MFP for three consecutive loans and has had no payment problems. On the contrary, he cancelled his loan ahead of some due dates and he is committed to continue working in the same way for this loan cycle. He will use the loan for one thousand five hundred PEN that he has applied for to purchase chemical fertilizers so he can fertilize during the months his crops need it.

Translated from Spanish by Susan Haynes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of fertilizers

loans.name: Magdalene

texts.en: Magdalene is 43 years old and married with four children. She sells shoes, bags and clothes. Magdalene is requesting the loan amount of 140,000 NGN to purchase more stock to sell. She sends her thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more shoes, bags and clothes to sell

loans.name: Kate

texts.en: Kate I. is 38 years old and married with four children. She sells foodstuffs and is requesting the loan amount of 60,000 NGN to purchase more stock to sell. She sends her thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more foodstuffs to sell

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is 37 years old and married with five children. She is a hair stylist and also sells hair extensions. Esther is requesting the loan amount of 80,000 NGN to purchase more hair extensions to sell. She sends her thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more hair extensions to sell

loans.name: Reyna Maria

texts.es: La señora Reyna Maria O. A., tiene la edad de 41 años. Habita en el barrio San Ignacio en la comunidad de Ticuantepe, su esposo es comerciante, Doña Reyna le apoya con los gastos del hogar, ellos tiene tres hijas a su cargo, actualmente estudian, los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida a sus hijas y poder apoyarlas siempre en sus estudios, desde hace veintiún años se dedica a la agricultura, la mayor dificultad que se le presenta son la plagas que afectan los cultivos de pitahayas. Con el financiamiento va a comprar fertilizantes e insumos para a aplicar al cultivo y obtener una producción para vender a mejor precio en el mercado. Dá las gracias a Afodenic por los beneficios que obtenido ya que este es su noveno ciclo y a través de los préstamos ha logrado proyectarse en mantener en buenas condiciones su cultivo.
texts.en:
Reyna Maria Osajo A. is 41 years old and lives in the San Ignacio neighborhood of Ticuantepe with her husband. He works as a shopkeeper to support the household. They have three daughters who are in school. She plans to improve the living conditions for their daughters and to keep supporting them in their studies. She has worked in farming for 21 years. The biggest difficulty she has are blights that affect the pitahayas, or dragon fruits. With this loan she is going to buy fertilizer and other applications for the crop so that her produce can sell for a better price in the market. She is grateful to Afodenic for the help she has received throughout her nine cycles with them. With these loans, she has been able to able plan and maintain good farming conditions.

Translated from Spanish by Kelly Wester, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Fertilizer and other crop applications

loans.name: Martins

texts.en: Martins is 32 years old and married with one child. He is standing next to his wife in the picture. Martins sells provisions, foodstuffs and drinks, and is requesting the loan amount of 50,000 NGN to purchase more stock to sell. He sends his thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more provisions and drinks to sell

loans.name: Raul Enrique

texts.es: Raúl Enrique, tiene 28 años de edad,  el vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos, menores de edad, el se dedica a la elaboración y venta de playeras, empezó este negocio hace aproximadamente 6 años cuando murió su papá. El empezó con este negocio gracias a Dios su padre le dejo esta oportunidad para que el empezará de nuevo con el, ahora es de su propiedad. El sale a vender sus productos en diferentes municipios y lugares, a dejar su pedido  en tiendas y otros comercios.  El destino del préstamo que solicita es para comprar una maquina para serigrafías, ya que el no cuenta con esa posibilidad y para el, es una oportunidad que se esta perdiendo por no tener esa maquina.  Su sueño es tener esta maquina,  y con eso ya puede ampliar  el negocio, también con eso El puede mejor sus ganancias para el  un futuro un mejor futuro de su familia.
texts.en:
Raul Enrique is 28 years old and he lives with his wife and two small children. He makes a sells T-Shirts. He started out his business about 6 years ago when his father passed away. With his father's inheritance he has been able to start out with a piece of property. He goes otu to sell his products to different municipalities and areas, to deliver orders to stores and other businesses. The loan requested will be used to purchase a silkscreen printing machine seeing as he does not have one now, and he feels he is missing out on opportunities by not having it. His dream is to have this machine so that he could expand his business and to improve his earnings for his future, and for a better future of his family.


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase equipment for his clothing business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To invest in the purchase of merchandise for her bed linen business.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en: Josephine E. is 48 years old and married with eight children. She sells drinks and sachet water, and is requesting the loan amount of 100,000 NGN to purchase more stock to sell. She sends her thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more drinks and sachet water to sell

loans.name: Nubia Isabel

texts.es: La señora Nubia Isabel Martínez  tiene 63 años de edad, reside en el barrio México en la capital de Managua, soltera, sus hijos están independientes. Su negocio es una pulpería que administra desde hace treinta y seis años, también vende gas licuado, este negocio lo inicio con fondos propio y ayuda de su mama. Este es su octavo crédito en Afodenic, el cual va invertir en productos de consumo diarios como: pollo, carnes, queso, y granos básicos que es lo que los clientes consumen más. Da las gracias ala institución por los beneficios alcanzados ya que mediante estos créditos ha logrado mejorar su vivienda ya que con anteriores créditos lo invirtió en infraestructura. Sus metas es poder seguir incrementando su negocio para obtener mejores utilidades.
texts.en:
Nubia Isabel M. is 63 years old and she lives in the Mexico district of the capital city of Managua. She is single and her children are independent. She runs a grocery store, one she's had for the past 36 years. She also sells fuel gas. She started out her business with her own money and with the help of her mother. This is her eighth loan with Afodenic (Kiva Field Partner), and these funds will be invested in the purchase of every day items, such as: chicken, meats, cheese, and basic grains, all products highly demanded by her clients. She is grateful to the organization for the benefits offered to her. With these loans she has been able to improve her home, having invested past loans in renovations for the house. Her goal is to keep on building on her business to improve her living conditions.


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase chicken, meats, and milk products

loans.name: Arlen Maria

texts.es: Arlen es soltera, de 23 años de edad, es trabajadora del Banco de Finanzas, con 4 años de servicio como oficial de servicios bancarios, para utilizarlo en su vivienda para poner ceramica a toda la casa, y pintar una puerta del baño; en estos momentos habita en casa de sus padres, pero lo sera por poco tiempo, ya que tiene planes de matrimonio en diciembre, es por esta razon que quiere dar mejores condiciones a la casa que compro al credito, desde este momento cuenta con el apoyo de su futuro esposo, quien asume el 50% del valor de la cuota de la vivienda, se siente muy afortunada, pues tambien recibe el apoyo de su papá que es ganadero de la region.
texts.en:
Arlen is single, she is 23 years old, and she works at Banco de Finanzas. She has 4 years' service as a teller. She hopes to renovate her home by installing ceramic tiling in the entire house, and to paint the bathroom door. She currently lives with her parents but only in short term, as she plans to wed in December. For this rason she wants to improve her home that she purchased. She is already receiving support from her future husband that has taken on 50% of the mortgage. She feels so lucky, especially because she also receives the support of her father, who is a farmer in the area.


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To install ceramic tiling and to paint the bathroom door.

loans.name: Osakpamwan

texts.en: Osakpamwan is 40 years old and married with seven children. She sells cooked foods, and is requesting the loan amount of 60,000 NGN to purchase more foodstuffs to cook and sell. She sends her thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more foodstuffs to cook and sell

loans.name: Anthonia

texts.en: Anthonia is 32 years old and married with two children. She owns a computer center, and is requesting a loan of 90,000 NGN to purchase a laminating machine to enable her to laminate documents for her customers. Anthonia sends her thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase a laminating machine

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es: La señora Maria Auxiliadora R. Pérez, tiene la edad de 61 años, habita en el barrio San José de los Ríos, ubicado en el municipio de Ticuantepe, junto a su esposo el cual trabaja como transportista, para apoyarle con los gastos del hogar, ellos tienen cuatro hijos , de los cuales tres de ellos son independientes y uno que a su cargo , los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida , desde hace treinta años dedica a la agricultura , el mayor problema que se le presenta son las plagas por falta de fertilizantes e insumos necesarios , ya que no cuenta con un financiamiento . Los planes hacia un futuro es poder trabajar sus tierras con obras de conservación de suelo. Con el financiamiento obtenido a comprar fertilizantes e insumos para aplicar al cultivo y obtener una buena producción.
texts.en:
Maria Auxiliadora R. P. is 61 years old. She lives in the San Jose de los Rios district, located in the municipality of Ticuantepe. Together with her husband she works as an agriculturer, to help cover the household expenses. They have four children, three of whom are independent and only one is still in their care. Her plans for the family are to improve their living conditions. For thirthy years she was an agriculturer but the greatest problem she faced were pest infestations and the lack of fertilizers and other necessary items. She is no longer financed. Her future plans are to be able to work the fields in a way that will conserve the topsoil. With this loan she will purchase fertilizers and other items to use in the harvest, so to enjoy a good yield.


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers and other items to use in the harvest.

loans.name: Juan Pablo

texts.es:
El señor Juan Pablo L. tiene ya más de cuatro años con su negocio de preparación y venta de productos para la limpieza, es la fuente de ingresos para su familia.
En esté momento le está haciendo falta materia prima para poder preparar los productos que le están solicitando su clientes, pero no cuenta con el capital necesario, portal motivo está solicitando un préstamo y así poder compara la material que necesita y poder entregar los pedido a tiempo, para que sus clientes estén contentos y lo puedan recomendar a otras persona y así sus ingresos mejoraran y la vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Pablo L. has been preparing and selling clearing products for over four years. This is his source of income for his family. He now lacks the raw materials he needs to prepare the products that his customers are asking for. He does not have the capital he needs. That is why he is asking for a loan, which he will use to buy the necessary materials to be able to deliver his orders on time. Then his customers will be happy, and they can recommend him to other people. This way his income and his family life will improve.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy raw materials for his business

loans.name: Lauro Gerardo

texts.es:
El señor Lauro Gerardo G. vive en una casa prestada junto con su esposa y sus tres hijos. 
Como desea tener su propia vivienda está tramitando una casa por medio de Infonavit (Crédito Gubernamental). Pero el valor de la vivienda es superior al crédito que el puede recibir ya que su sueldo es bajo, el  trabajo como mesero en un restauran de un hotel.
Por tal motivo solicita un préstamo para completar el crédito gubernamental y así adquirí su casa. Desea tener un patrimonio seguro para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Lauro Gerardo G. lives in a house that has been lent to him, along with his wife and three children. Since he would like to have his own house, he is applying for a house through Infonavit (governmental credit). However, the value of the house is more than the loan he can receive because his income is low. He works as a waiter in a hotel restaurant. For this reason, he is applying for a loan to complement the government loan so that he can buy his house. He wants to provide his children a secure future.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: The difference on the down payment to purchase a house through Infonavit

loans.name: Heliodoro

texts.es:
El señor Heliodoro López Hernández, tiene la edad de 45 años, habita en el barrio San Caralampio municipio de Ticuantepe
 Junto a su esposa, la cual le apoya con los gastos del hogar, ellos tiene a su cargo cuatro hijos, todos menores de edad, estudian actualmente, los planes a su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida, desde hace 10 años se dedica a la agricultura, la mayor dificultad que se le presenta son los gases que expulsa el volcán y le afecta gran parte a la piña, 
A futuro es poder darle mejor mantenimiento al cultivo. Con el financiamiento va a comprar fertilizantes e insumos para aplicar al cultivo y poder tener una buena producción.
texts.en:
Heliodoro López Hernández, 45, lives in the San Caralampio neighborhood in the Ticuantepe municipality. He lives with his wife; she helps with the household expenses. They have four young children who are currently in school. The family plan is to improve their living conditions. He has been a farmer for ten years. The biggest difficulty he has is the gas expelled by the volcano because it affects a large part of the pineapples. In the future, he would like to be able to maintain his crops better. With the loan he will buy fertilizers and supplies to apply to his crops. This way he will be able to have better production.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy supplies and fertilizers to apply to his crops

loans.name: Bomengo Plus Group

texts.fr: Patrice K. est un micro entrepreneur depuis longtemps. Sa boutique a pris naissance en 1988 et a bien évolué jusqu’en 1990. Les pillages de 1991 et 1993 à Kinshasa avaient emporté toute la marchandise de sa boutique et lui ont causé la faillite. De 1998 à ce jour, Patrice s’est réorganisé pour relancer une fois encore la boutique. Il est pour le moment content car son affaire évolue comme il le souhaite malgré quelques difficultés dues à la dépréciation monétaire. Sa boutique générale comprend des boites de conserve, des savons, des bougies, des papiers hygiéniques, du lait, du sucre, du sel etc…. Il a planifié de renforcer avec le crédit du mois de mai en cours, le stock des marchandises de son affaire en vue d’accroitre le revenu et satisfaire les besoins de sa clientèle qui ne cessent d’augmenter. Son ambition est d’ouvrir aussi un magasin d’habillement mixte. Le marché est grand dans son quartier. Actuellement, il totalise aujourd’hui un capital propre de $300 et son activité lui génère un bénéfice de $175 par mois. Il a rejoint un des groupes de Hope RDC depuis 2008 dans le but de réaliser son rêve. Patrice a 47 ans, marié et père de 8 enfants dont leurs varient entre 17 et 32 ans.  Trois d’entre eux sont indépendants et cinq vivent avec Patrice et son épouse et vont à l’école.
texts.en:
Patrice K. has been a micro-entrepreneur for a long time. His shop, originated in 1988, really improved through 1990. The pillaging in 1991 and 1993 in Kinshasa had carried off all the merchandise in his shop and cause his bankruptcy. From 1998 to today, Patrice got reorganized, relaunching his shop once again. For now, he is happy because his business is improving as he would like, despite some difficulties due to monetary depreciation. His general store includes canned foods, soaps, candles, toilet paper, milk, sugar, salt, etc... With the loan of this May, he has planned to bolster his stock of merchandise aiming to increase his revenues and to satisfy the needs of his ever-growing customer base. His ambition is to open a store for men's and women's clothing. The market is big in his district. Currently, he totals up $300 in capital and his work generates a profit of $175 per month. He has joined a HOPE RDC group in 2008 with the goal of realizing his dream Patrice is 47 years old, married, and the father of eight children, ranging in age from 17 to 32. Three of them are on their own, and five live with Patrice and his wife and go to school.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To bolster his inventory for increasing is profits

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es:
La señora Maria de los Ángeles C., tiene la edad de 47 años habita en el barrio San Ignacio en la comunidad de Ticuantepe.
Junto a su esposo el cual trabaja como conductor, ellos tienen cuatro hijos, dos de ellos están casados y trabajan como albañil, y dos están a su cargo, los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida, ella desde hace 15 años se dedica a venta de electrodomésticos en las regiones del país, el mayor problema que se le presenta es la falta de financiamiento, con el préstamo va a incrementar su inventario comprando electrodoméstico para cumplir a la demanda
texts.en:
Mrs. Maria de los Ángeles C. is 47 years old and lives in the San Ignacio neighborhood of Ticuantepe. Maria and her husband, who works as a driver, have four children. Two of their children are married and work as bricklayers and two live at home. They would like to improve their living conditions and provide a better life for their family. Maria has sold electric appliances around the country for 15 years. The biggest problem she faces is lack of financing. With this loan, she plans to increase her inventory by buying enough appliances to keep up with demand.

Translated from Spanish by Shelly Hubman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Comprar electrodomesticos para incremetar su inventario y sus ventas

loans.name: Eliezer Francisco

texts.es:
El Joven Eliezer Francisco C. M., tiene la edad de 26 años, habita en le barrio Esquipulas, junto a sus padres
y hermanos, su mama trabaja como cocinera en el mismo hotel donde el labora la misma actividad , ellos son cuatro hermanos una de ella es discapacitada , una de 18 años que estudia y otro 20  trabaja y estudia , ellos son una familia muy unida , Eliezer es el mayor el cual tiene el sueños de poder terminar de construir su casa , ya que este es el segundo financiamiento , y se siente muy contento ya que le brindamos la mano de AFODENIC , para cumplir sus sueños , con el primer crédito logro hacer las divisiones de los cuartos y ahora quiere hacer parte de la cocina , la cual le falta paredes y techo . Con el financiamiento va a comprar materiales de construcción para poder terminar la cocina.
texts.en:
Young Eliezer Francisco C. M. is 26 years old and lives in the Esquipulas neighborhood with his parents and siblings. His mother works as a cook in the same hotel he cooks in. There are four children in the family. One has a disability, another is an 18-year-old student, and the other is a 20 year old, who both works and studies. This is a very close family. Eliezer is the oldest and dreams of being able to finish building their house. This is his second loan and he is happy for AFODENIC’s help in making his dreams come true. With the first loan, he was able to divide the rooms and now he would like to do the kitchen, which still needs walls and a roof. With this loan, he will buy construction materials so he can finish the kitchen.

Translated from Spanish by Shelly Hubman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Compara materiales de construcion para terminar de hacer la cosina

loans.name: Yader Javier

texts.es: El joven Yader Javier Sánchez, tiene la edad de 27 años, habita en el barrio Pablo Calero, junto a su esposa la cual trabaja para ayudarle con los gastos del hogar, ellos tienen a su cargo dos hijos , que actualmente estudian su primaria , los planes hacia su familia es poder construir su casa , ya que ellos habitan en cuarto , desde hace 10 años se dedica a los trabajos agrícolas , con sus propios esfuerzos ha logrado mantener estable su cultivo , en momento ha sido afectado por plagas , ya que carecen de fertilizantes e insumos por falta de financiamiento . Con el préstamo va a comprar los insumos necesarios para su cultivo y así poder lograr una buena producción y con las ganancias poder terminar de hacer su vivienda que es uno de sus anheló para su familia.
texts.en:
Yader Javier Sánchez, a young man of 27 years, lives in the community of Pablo Calero with his wife who works to help him with the household expenses. They have two children who are primary school students. His plans for his family are to be able to finish building his house, since they now live in a room. For ten years he has worked in agriculture. With his own efforts he has been able to maintain stability in his crop although at times it has been affected by plagues (insects, weeds, disease) since he lacks fertilizer and other supplies because of lack of financing. With this loan he is going to buy the necessary inputs for his crop and thus be able to attain a better production and with the earnings be able to finish building the house that is one of his wishes for his family.

Translated from Spanish by Daniel Burke, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy construction materials to finish building the living room of his house

loans.name: Narciso Eusebio

texts.es:
El socio es el Sr.: NACISO, el es natural de Pilcopata, situada en el distrito de kosñipata en la provincia de Paucartambo, correspondiente al departamento del Cusco, correspondiendo a la entrada al parque nacional del Manu, a 8 horas de la ciudad del Cusco.

Nuestro socio es agricultor, el tiene terrenos en los cuales cultiva, arroz, yuca, plátano, piña. Pero el también tiene invertido su capital en una pequeña tienda de abarrotes, para lo cual también solicita el préstamo para reinvertir en la tienda de abarrotes y comprar aceite, azúcar, fideos, harinas y otros que esta zona no produce.

El socio se encuentra sumamente agradecido por el apoyo prestado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago total de su deuda en el plazo determinado.
texts.en:
Mr. Narciso H. is a native of Pilcopata, located in the Kosñipata district of the Paucartambo province, department of Cusco. His town is near the entrance of the Manu National Park, located some 8 hours from the city of Cusco.

Our client is a farmer who has crop fields where he cultivates rice, cassava, plantains, and pineapples. He has also invested his capital in a small general store. He is requesting this loan in order to reinvest in his store by purchasing cooking oil, sugar, noodles, flour, and other goods that are not produced in the area.

Our client is extremely grateful for the support that he has been given, committing himself to paying back his loan within the established time frame.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Restock general store

loans.name: Marco Angel

texts.es:
El socio es el Sr.: MARCO ANGEL,  el es natural de Pilcopata, situada en el distrito de kosñipata en la provincia de Paucartambo, correspondiente al departamento del Cusco, correspondiendo a la entrada al parque nacional del Manu, a 8 horas de la ciudad del Cusco.

El socio tiene como principal actividad la agricultura, (yuca, arroz, frutas), pero el la alterna con un nuevo negocio para lo cuál pide el préstamo, el tiene un terreno en la carretera que va hacia Cusco, y el desea poner un lava autos, dónde le permita tener maquinaria para engrasar, pulverizar y el desea comprar en especial una compresora, para lo cual requiere el préstamo, sería el único en la zona y es uno de sus proyectos.

Nuestro socio esta feliz de poder contar con este apoyo y manifiesta su agradecimiento y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de su préstamo en el tiempo programado.
texts.en:
Mr. Marco Angel N. is a native of Pilcopata, located in the Kosñipata district of the Paucartambo province, department of Cusco. His town is near the entrance of the Manu National Park, located some 8 hours from the city of Cusco.

Our client’s main business activity is agriculture (cassava, rice, and fruit), but he wants to alternate it with a new business, which is why he is requesting this loan. He owns a plot of land near the road to Cusco, and he would like to set up a well-equipped car wash on his property. He would especially like to purchase an air compressor, which is why he needs the loan. His would be the only car wash in the area, and this is one of his goals.

Our client is happy to be able to count on this support, and expresses his gratitude, committing himself to pay off his loan in the established time frame

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase air compressor for car wash

loans.name: Michael Gerardo

texts.es: El señor Michael Gerardo A. P. tiene la edad de 26 años, habita en el reparto Juan Ramón Padilla, junto a su esposa, la cual trabaja para apoyarle con los gastos del hogar, ellos tiene tres hijos, los cuales todos estudian, los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida, desde hace siete años trabaja como bombero en TEXACO, el con financiamientos anteriores logro hacer parte de su vivienda, con este crédito es su quinto ciclo en Afodenic el cual va a comprar materiales de construcción para terminar de hacer su vivienda, y poder gozar con su familia de una casa digna. da las gracias a la institución por los beneficios logrado.
texts.en:
Mr. Michael Gerardo A. P. is 26 years old and lives in the housing development Juan Ramón Padilla. He lives with his wife, who works to help him with the household expenses. They have three children who are all students. They would like to improve their lives. He has worked as a fireman for 7 years with TEXACO. With earlier loans, he was able to build part of his home. With this loan (his 5th round with Adodenic), he will buy construction materials so he can finish his house and be able to enjoy a dignified house together with his family. He is thankful for the institution and the benefits they have provided.

Translated from Spanish by Shelly Hubman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Comprar materiales de construccion para terminar de hacer su vivienda

loans.name: Saúl

texts.es: Saúl es un joven soltero de 27 años, que apoya en los trabajos agrícolas a sus padres para brindarles comodidades a sus hermanas menores, quienes viven juntamente con él, en la casa de sus padres. Por más de 10 años se dedica a la agricultura, durante este tiempo aprendió a tener dominio y conocimiento de la tierra, se levanta muy temprano, para que a las 8.00am ya esté trabajando en la chacra. A Saúl le gusta su labor porque depende de la atención que le ponga a sus plantas, serán sus cosechas, y en todos estos años le han generado muy buenas ganancias. Por ello le dedica toda su atención, para que produzcan en cantidad y productos de gran tamaño, pero pese a eso, en algunas oportunidades a pesar de ser abonadas y fumigadas no le han dado buenos resultados, y en otras ha obtenido grandes ganancias. Ahora, Saúl ha tenido una excelente cosecha de papa, y ha acumulado varios sacos de ella en su depósito, de donde de poco a poco las va comercializando, y antes que las termine de enviar al mercado, quiso posar allí para la foto. Este es su tercer crédito con MFP, durante los préstamos anteriores no tuvo dificultades de pago, y espera seguir manteniéndose con ese record, él es un cliente muy jovial, y en sus conversaciones siempre aflora su picardía innata, lo que es muy apreciado por sus compañeros del banco comunal al que pertenece. Saúl planea invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes químicos, para realizar el abonado de sus próximos cultivos de papa.
texts.en:
Saul is a young man of 27 years, he is single and he helps his parents with their agricultural work to provide his younger sisters with what they need. They all live together in their parents' house. For more than 10 years he has worked as an agriculturer and during this time he has learned how to manage the fields and all there is to know. His day starts very early - by the time it's 8 a.m. he is already in the fields. Saul loves his work because he can see his efforts in his plants that will eventually be the harvest. Every year he has gotten very good yield and earnings. That's why he spends all of his efforts there, to produce large quantities of harvest. Sometimes his harvest suffers despite the use of fertilizers and pesticides, while other times he has enjoyed large harvests. Saul has an excellent harvest of potatoes and he has already gathered up many sacks full in his storage. Slowly he sells them, but before he shipped them all out to the market he decided to pose for the photo. This is his third loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner). In the past loans he has not had any trouble paying them back and he hopes to keep up his record. He is a very happy client and his conversation always reveals his innate sense of joy, something that is very much appreciated by his colleagues in the community bank. Saul plans on investing the requsted funds in the purchase of chemical fertilizers for future potato plantations.


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Teófilo

texts.es: Teofilo tiene 47 años, es un hombre muy noble, vive en su casa propia junto a su amada esposa, quien le dio 4 hijos. De los cuales, los mayores estudian en el colegio de la ciudad, y los menores en la escuela de su comunidad. Por más de 27 años, se viene dedicando a la siembra de papa, olluco y cebada en chacras  alquiladas, durante estos años acumuló experiencia agrícola, tales como el conocimiento temporal del ciclo del año para priorizar qué productos sembrar, ya que de ello dependerá el resultado de sus cosechas, pero pese a tener experiencia, no siempre acierta en sus siembras. Es por ello que observa y contempla constantemente sus cultivos, para detectar a tiempo y fumigar cualquier amenaza de plaga. Teofilo está muy contento con sus cultivos, ya que durante estos años nunca ha perdido, y sus productos, algunas veces, fueron exportados a otras ciudades, lo que le ha permitido acumular buenas ganancias, con estas, pudo comprar otras tierras donde viene incrementando sus siembras. Este es su tercer préstamo consecutivo con MFP, durante estos créditos ha demostrado puntualidad en cada uno de sus pagos, y para este nuevo ciclo hace promesas de seguir trabajando igual. Asimismo, se siente muy feliz de pertenecer a su banco comunal, donde está ahorrando su dinero. Con los setecientos nuevos soles solicitados, piensa comprar insecticidas para fumigar sus cultivos contra los mosquitos que vienen perjudicando las hojas de sus papas y arvejas (en la foto sale con su mochila fumigadora).
texts.en:
Teofilo is 47 years old. He is a very noble man, living in his own home together with his beloved wife who gave him four children. Of them, the eldest are attending school in the city and the youngest go to the community school. For more than 27 years he has been harvesting potatoes, sweet potatoes and wheat on rented fields. During these years he gathred agricultural experience, such as the seasons of the year to better prioritize the kinds of harvest of the time of year. This ultimately translates to the success of his harvests, but although he has this experience, he doesn't always enjoy large harvests. He constantly tends to and looks after his harvests, to immediatley know when it's time to fumigate against any pests. Teofilo loves his harvests, especially because it has been many years since he's lost out. Sometimes he exports to other cities and this helps him increase his earnings even more. With savings he managed to purchase more land where he continuously increases his plantations. This is his third loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner), and during these loan periods he has always been on time with his payments. For this new loan he promises to show the same responsibility. He feels so happy to belong to a community bank, from where he is borrowing the funds. With the seven hundred neuvos soles requested, he will purchase insecticides to fumigate his harvests agains mosquitoes that damange the leaves from the potato and pea plants. (In the photo he can be seen wearing his fumigation gear).


Translated from Spanish by Erika Lindig, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase insecticides.

loans.name: Teófilo

texts.es: Teófilo tiene 51 años, es casado y tiene 9 hijos, de los cuales, 4 de ellos formaron su propia familia y viven fuera de casa; mientras que los 5 menores siguen viviendo con él y con su esposa en su casa propia, y por ellos sigue trabajando para darles educación. La compra, crianza y venta de carneros es la actividad que desarrolla diariamente, se levanta muy temprano por la mañana para cortar la avena que sirve de alimento para sus carneros, antes de llevarlos al campo, donde también comerán de pastos frescos para ayudar a que se desarrollen en menor tiempo y engorden fácilmente, ya que de eso dependerá su peso y tamaño al momento de comercializarlos. Por otra parte, en sus días libres, se dedica a la siembra de papa, alverja y avena con la ayuda de sus hijos y su esposa, para cubrir los gastos de alimentación y educación de sus hijos. Pero, lo más rentable para Teofilo es la venta de la carne de sus animales, por ello le dedica mayor tiempo a esa actividad, y se siente muy complacido con las buenas ganancias que obtiene. Además, hay algunos meses donde este negocio se hace mucho más rentable, esto le está permitiendo avizorar adquirir un puesto en el mercado de la ciudad de Tarma, ya que cuenta con la clientela que hizo durante todos estos años. Este es su tercer crédito con MFP, y durante estos años que viene trabajando (2), Teófilo demostró ser un cliente puntual, y para este nuevo ciclo hace compromisos de seguir trabajando con la misma responsabilidad. Los mil quinientos soles que solicita, incrementará la cantidad de su ganado, además comprará chacras de avena sembrada para alimentar a sus corderos.
texts.en:
Teófilo, 51, is married and has nine children. Four of the children no longer live with them because they have formed their own families. The five younger children live with him and his wife in their own home. Teófilo and his wife keep working to give them an education. His daily work is buying, raising, and selling sheep. He gets up very early in the morning to cut the oats that he feeds the sheep. He then takes them to the fields where they will eat fresh grass to help them develop in less time and to easily fatten them. Their size and weight are what matters when he sells them. On his days off he plants potatoes, peas, and oats to cover the feeding expenses and the expenses of educating his children. His children and wife help him with the planting. However, the most profitable for Teófilo is selling the meat from his animals. He spends most of his time on that. He is pleased with the good earnings he gets. Also, there are months that this business is much more profitable. This is allowing him to stay alert to getting a stall in the market in the city of Tarma. He has a good client base after all of these years. This is his third loan with MFP, and during the two years working with them Teófilo has shown himself to be a punctual client. For this new loan cycle Teófilo promises to keep working responsibly. The 1,500 PEN is to increase his quantity of livestock. He will also buy fields of planted oats to feed his sheep.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase his livestock and buy food for his sheep

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es:
El señor Juan José C. tiene la edad de 65 años, habita en el reparto Juan Ramón Padilla, en la comunidad de Ticuantepe junto a su esposa, ellos tiene tres hijos, todos mayores de edad y casados, los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida, el desde hace treinta y un
Años se dedica a la agricultura, con sus propios esfuerzos inicio esta activad, los planes hacia un futuro es su cultivo es poder comprar mas terreno y poder heredar a sus hijos. Con el financiamiento obtenido va a comprar los fertilizantes e insumos necesarios para aplicar al cultivo y poder obtener una buena producción.
texts.en:
Mr. Juan Jose C. is 65 years old, lives with his wife in the Juan Ramon Padilla area of the Ticuantepe community. They have three children, all adults and married. He wishes to improve the living conditions of his family. He has been a farmer for the last thirty one years. He started this activity on his own. He wants to be able to buy more land and leave the farm for his children. The loan proceeds will buy more fertilizer and supplies for his fields and will make him able to improve his production.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Bobbit, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase supplies and fertilizers needed for the crops.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
El socio es el Sr. PEDRO, el es natural de Pilcopata, situada en el distrito de kosñipata en la provincia de Paucartambo, correspondiente al departamento del Cusco, correspondiendo a la entrada al parque nacional del Manu, a 8 horas de la ciudad del Cusco.

Aquí encontramos al socio que pidió permiso de su trabajo para apersonarse al la reunión del banco comunal, y lo acompañé a su centro de trabajo que estaba al frente de la reunión, entonces le tomamos la foto en pleno trabajo, ya reincorporado en su puesto, este socio tiene 2 hijos (13, 12) años es casado y el es obrero, se hace llamar el constructor,  el socio requiere el préstamo para poder implementar su tienda abarrotes, en la que su esposa administrara, ellos desean implementar su negocio y comprar en cantidades grandes, aceite, fideos, harinas, trigo, papa, maíz y otros productos que la zona no produce, para lo cual solicitan el préstamo.

El socio esta muy feliz y valora el préstamo otorgado, por lo que se compromete a cumplir con el pago total de su deuda.
texts.en:
Mr. Pedro C. T. is a native of Pilcopata, located in the Kosñipata district of the Paucartambo province, department of Cusco. His town is near the entrance of the Manu National Park, located some 8 hours from the city of Cusco.

Here we have our client, who asked for permission at work so that he could attend the microfinance institute’s meeting. I joined him at his workplace, which was in front of the meeting place, so I took a picture of him while he was in the middle of work. Mr. C. has a wife and 2 children, ages 13 and 12. He is a construction worker who is known as “El Constructor.” He needs a loan so that he can establish his own general store, which his wife will manage. They hope to set up their business and purchase large quantities of goods, such as cooking oil, noodles, flour, wheat, potatoes, corn and other products that are not produced in the area, which is why they are requesting this loan.

Our client is very happy and values the loan that he has been given, committing himself to pay off his loan.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Establish general store

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es:
El socio es el Sr. JAIME, el es natural de Pilcopata, situada en el distrito de kosñipata en la provincia de Paucartambo, correspondiente al departamento del Cusco, correspondiendo a la entrada al parque nacional del Manu, a 8 horas de la ciudad del Cusco.

El socio tiene 28 años de edad, y tiene 2 hijos de 5 y 1 año, el es conviviente y su principal actividad es la agricultura, el cultiva arroz, frutas, yuca y coca, el socio requiere el préstamo, por que desea invertir en la compra de una moto taxi, es una moto armada como una carreta, esta es muy conveniente para el clima que tiene Pilcopata ya que estamos en la selva de Cusco, y gozan de un clima fabuloso, para esto requiere el préstamo y de ese modo hacer servicio de transporte entre los poblados que le anteceden a este.

El socio esta muy agradecido y valora el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de su deuda en el plazo determinado.
texts.en:
Mr. Jaime C. C. is a native of Pilcopata, located in the Kosñipata district of the Paucartambo province, department of Cusco. His town is near the entrance to the Manu National Park, located some 8 hours from the city of Cusco.

Our client is a 28-year-old man who has a live-in partner and two children, ages 5 and 1. His main business activity is agriculture. He grows rice, fruit, cassava and coca. Mr. C. needs a loan that he wishes to invest in purchasing a motorcycle taxi—a motorcycle equipped with a passenger wagon. This taxi will be very convenient in Pilcopata’s climate because we are located in the Cusco jungle, where we enjoy excellent weather. He needs this loan so that he can provide transportation services in the nearby villages.

The client is very grateful and values the loan that he has been given, committing himself to pay it back in the established time frame.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase motorcycle taxi

loans.name: Jose Felix

texts.es: El señor José Félix F. A., tiene la edad de 54 años, habita en el barrio San Ignacio en la comunidad de Ticuantepe junto a su esposa la cual le apoya  con las actividades del hogar, esposa tiene 4hijos, ya todos independientes, los planes hacia  su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida. Don José Félix desde hace 30 años se dedica a  la agricultura, el mayor problema que se le ha presentado durante este tiempo es la falta de financiamiento, el inicio esta actividad con sus propios esfuerzos, los planes hacia su cultivo es diversificarlo. Con el financiamiento obtenido va a comprar insumos y fertilizantes para aplicar al cultivo y poder tener una buena producción
texts.en:
Mr. Jose Felix F. A. is 54 years old and lives in the San Ignacio neighborhood in the community of Ticuantepe with his wife, who is a homemaker. They have 4 children who are all independent. He plans to improve his family living conditions. Mr. Jose Felix has dedicated himself to the agriculture for the last 30 years. The greatest challenge he has faced during this time is the lack of financial help. He started in this activity whit his own efforts; he plans to diversify his crop. With the funding obtained he will buy supplies and fertilizers for the crops so he can have a good production.

Translated from Spanish by Adriana Pierce, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Jose Toribio

texts.es:
El socio es el Sr. JOSE, el es natural de Pilcopata, situada en el distrito de kosñipata en la provincia de Paucartambo, correspondiente al departamento del Cusco, correspondiendo a la entrada al parque nacional del Manu, a 8 horas de la ciudad del Cusco.

El socio tiene 58 años de edad el es viudo y tiene 6 hijos los últimos tienen 19 y 15 años, el alterna sus actividades de agricultor, lleva a las diferentes ciudades donde no hay producción de frutas, sus diferentes frutas (pacay, guanábana, aguaje, plátanos diversas variedades, naranjas, piñas, limas, duraznos, melones, masa zamba, chirimoyas), y al volver trae artículos de limpieza y ropa, el trae de la capital del Perú ropa al por mayor de verano para poder vender en su población, para lo cuál requiere el préstamo para transportar y traer de vuelta su mercadería.

El socio es un señor muy amable y agradece y valora el apoyo otorgado mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago total de su deuda en el tiempo programado.
texts.en:
The member Jose is from Pilcopata, located in the district of Kosñipata, in the province of Paucartambo, in the department of Cusco, which is near the entrance to the Manu National Park, 8 hours from the city of Cusco. Jose is 58 years old, widowed, and has 6 children, the last of which are 19 and 15; he alternates his agricultural activities, takes his goods to the different cities where there isn’t fruit production (he grows are: pacay, soursop, aguaje, various plantains, oranges, pineapples, limes, peaches, melons, masa zamba, and custard apples), and upon his return he brings back cleaning supplies and clothing. He brings wholesale summer clothing to sell to his community from the capital of Peru, for which he requires a loan to be able to transport and bring back his merchandise. Jose is a very amiable man, and is thankful and values the support that has been granted to him through this means, in that same manner he promises to pay back his loan in total in the established time frame.

Translated from Spanish by Mariela Cedeno, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase wholesale clothing to sell.

loans.name: Eloy

texts.en:
Eloy is a member of the Immaculada Concepcion Village Bank, which meets in Pilcopata, a small town in the Peruvian jungle, about eight hours from the city of Cusco. Eloy is 38 years and married with three children, just one of whom lives with him. Eloy runs a rice-shelling business in town; local rice producers bring their harvest to him, and he resells it to local stores and in area markets. He works alone, though his son sometimes helps him. Eloy also has his own rice paddies. 

Eloy is requesting a loan of 1000 soles to improve his rice-shelling machinery. He plans to buy new cables and components for the machine. He has pledged to repay this loan in full and on time. Eloy’s dream for the future is to start a carpentry business to run in addition to his rice-shelling business. Pilcopata produces a lot of lumber, but there are few carpentry workshops or other businesses that produce refined wood products.

loans.use: Buy new cables and components for rice-shelling machine

loans.name: Fautino Gregorio

texts.es: El señor Faustino Gregorio C. G. , tiene la edad de 41 años, habita en el barrio , cavadilla ubicado en el municipio de Ticuantepe , junto a su esposa , la cual le poya con los gastos del hogar ; su esposa tiene cuatro hijos a su cargo , actualmente estudian y le poyan con los trabajos de campo , los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida , la mayor dificultad que le ha presentado durante 15 años, ha sido la sequiílla los planes hacia un futuro para su cultivo es diversificar el cultivo .Con el financiamiento va a comprar insumos y fertilizantes para aplicar al cultivo y poder lograr una buena producción.
texts.en:
Faustino C. G. is 41 and lives in the Cavadilla neighborhood in the town of Ticuantepe with his wife, who helps with the household expenses. She also takes care of the four children, who are currently in school but also assist with the fieldwork. Faustino's plan is to improve his family's living conditions. The greatest hardship for the past 15 years has been drought. In the future, Faustino plans to diversify his crops. He will use his loan to buy supplies and fertilizers for his crops so he can achieve a good yield.

Translated from Spanish by Jill Heske, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy supplies and fertilizers for his crops.

loans.name: Miguel De Los Santos

texts.es: El señor Miguel de los Santos C. Gutiérrez , tiene la edad de 43 años , habita en el barrio Pablo C. , ubicado en el municipio de Ticuantepe , junto a su compañera de vida , la cual le apoya con los gastos del hogar ; ellos tienen dos hijos a su cargo los cuales estudian actualmente y le apoyan en los trabajos agrícolas en sus tiempos libres , los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida , la mayor dificultad que se le presenta es la falta de financiamiento , durante veinte años trabajando duro para poder sacar adelante la producción , todavía no logra sus sueños . El inicio la actividad agrícolas con sus propios esfuerzos, Con el financiamiento disponible a va comprar fertilizantes e insumos para aplicar al cultivo y poder tener una buena producción.
texts.en:
Mr. Miguel de los Santos C. Gutiérrez is 43 years old and lives in the Pablo C. neighborhood in Ticuantepe. Miguel lives with his partner who helps him with the household expenses. They have two children who are students but who also help him with his agricultural work in their free time. The biggest problem he faces is lack of money. During the 20 years he has been working hard to produce more, he still hasn’t been able to achieve his dreams. He started out in agriculture on his own. With the available loan, he will buy fertilizers and supplies for his crops and hopefully get a good return.

Translated from Spanish by Shelly Hubman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Comprar insumos y fertilizante para aplicar al cultivo

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.en:
Maria Mercedes is a member of the Immaculada Concepcion Village Bank and lives in the small Peruvian jungle town of Pilcopata. She is 36 years old and lives with her partner and their three children. Two of her children are adolescents, while the youngest is just a year and a half old. Maria Mercedes works on her family farm, where she has been growing yucca and bananas for the past eight or nine years. After harvesting the crops, she sells them at the local market. Though Pilcopata is a very small town and consists of little more than a few blocks of houses and stores along a dirt road, its market is quite new and modern. Pilcopata receives a lot of traffic, since all travelers coming to surrounding towns come into Pilcopata first by bus. 

Maria Mercedes is requesting a loan of 2000 soles. She will use most of the loan money to pay her field hands. She usually employs two to three people during harvest time, and pays each worker 25 soles per day. Part of the money will also go towards her household expenses, and another part will be used to buy wood. She has pledged to repay this loan on time and in full. 

Maria Mercedes has been a member of her village bank ever since it was founded several years ago. Her goal for the future is to open a big store in Cusco and move to the city.

loans.use: Pay field hands, buy wood, cover household expenses

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: El señor Julio Cesar C. V. , tiene la edad de 38 años , habita en el barrio la borgoña , ubicado en el municipio de Ticuantepe , junto a su esposa , la cual le poya con las actividades del hogar , ellos tienen tres hijos , los cuales estudian y le apoyan con los trabajos agrícolas , los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida , desde hace treinta años, se dedica a la agricultura , el inicio esta actividad con el apoyo de sus padres , , los planes hacia un futuro es poder diversificar sus cultivos .Con el financiamiento obtenido va a comprar fertilizantes e insumos para mejorar el cultivo. Este es su sexto ciclo en Afodenic y da las gracias por los beneficios que ha logrado por el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Mr. Julio Cesar C. V. is 38 years old and lives in the Borgoña neighborhood of Ticuantepe. He lives with his wife who helps out with the home. They have three children who study and help with the agricultural work. He would like to provide his family with better living conditions. He has worked in agriculture for 30 years. He began this work with support from his parents. In the future, he would like to diversify his crops. With the loan, he will buy fertilizers and supplies to improve his production. This is his sixth round with Afodenic and he is thankful for the benefits he’s been able to gain for his family’s welfare.

Translated from Spanish by Shelly Hubman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Comprar insumos y fertilizantes para aplicar al cultivo

loans.name: Julia

texts.en:
Julia is a member of the Immaculada Concepcion Village Bank and lives in the Peruvian jungle town of Pilcopata. Julia is 52 years old and is married with six children, all of whom are now adults. Two of her children are married and have families of their own, while four are still single. Julia has a small neighborhood grocery store in the town of Pilcopata; she opened the store four years ago with her first loan from Asociacion Arariwa. She also has a second business selling lumber, which she cuts from her own land with the help of several workers. 

Julia is requesting a loan of 3000 soles, which she will use for two different purposes. She plans to put half of the money into her wood-cutting business to pay her workers and transport the wood from her land to the town of Pilcopata on a truck. She will use the rest of the money to buy a variety of basic grocery items to restock her neighborhood store. 

Julia enjoys being a member of her village bank, and plans to continue working with the group for the foreseeable future. Her goal for the future is to continue to expand both of her businesses.

loans.use: Pay workers and transport wood

loans.name: Luis Felipe

texts.es:
El Señor Luís F. tiene 34 años de edad, habitante del barrio Villa Reconciliación en la capital de Managua su esposa de profesión estilista, tiene dos hijos. La mejora de su vivienda es unos de los planes que tiene proyectado a un corto plazo ya que se requiere brindarle seguridad y protección. Don Luís posee conocimiento en construcción ya que se desempeña como maestro de obras desde hace 16 años de experiencia en el ramo. Mediante financiamiento pretende cumplir su meta de construir su vivienda por completa ofreciéndole comodidad a su familia.
Gracias al préstamo en Afodenic lograra comprar materiales de construcción serpentinas, colocar verjas, entecharlo. Obteniendo los beneficios deseados para su familia.
texts.en:
Luís F. is 34 and lives in the Villa Reconciliación neighborhood in the capital of Managua. His wife is a hairstylist and has two children. One of his short-term plans is to make improvements to his house to provide safety and security. He is knowledeable about construction because he's a construction foreman with 16 years of experience. Luís is going to use his loan to try to achieve his goal of finishing construction on his house to make his family comfortable. Thanks to the loan from AFODENIC he'll be able to buy rolls of construction materials, put in gates, and do the roofing, for the benefit of his family.

Translated from Spanish by Jill Heske, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy building materials to build a porch

loans.name: Constantine

texts.fr: Z. Constantine est née vers 1978 à Dekin un village de la ville de Porto-Novo, Capitale Administrative et Politique du BENIN dans le Département de l'Ouémé. Constantine est mariée et mère de deux enfants. Constantine vit avec sa famille dans une maison en location à Cotonou, Capitale Économique du Bénin. Constantine vend des condiments de sauce devant sa maison. C’est à Dantokpa, grand marché international du Bénin que Constantine achète ses condiments de sauce. Pour augmenter le volume de son activité et avoir plus de revenus, Constantine sollicite un prêt auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
Z. Constantine was born around 1978 in Dekin, a village of the city of Porto-Novo, the administrative and political capital of Benin, in Ouémé County. She is married and the mother of two and lives with her family in a rented house in Cotonou, the economic capital of Benin. Constantine sells sauce condiments in front of her house. Dantokpa, the grand international marketplace of Benin, is where she buys her goods. To increase the volume of her business and to earn more revenues, she's requesting a loan from ALIDÉ.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy five baskets of fresh tomatoes, a sack of chili peppers, and five 50-kg sacks of onions

loans.name: Abdoulaye

texts.fr: Abdoulaye S. vit à kolda où il est né. Il tient un atelier de menuiserie métallique avec l'aide trois (apprentis). Il est établit dans le quartier Doumassou et fabrique pricipalement des portes et des fenetres en fer, des grilles et d'autres objets en fer.Ses activités marchent et il parvient à faire face aux besoins sociaux de sa famille. Il voudrait cependant agrandir son atelier et ainsi utiliser plus de main-d'oeuvre.
texts.en:
Abdoulaye S. lives in Kolda, where he was born. He runs a metal welding workshop with help from three apprentices. He's located in the Doumassou neighborhood and mainly makes iron doors and windows, grilles, and other iron objects. His business is doing well, and he manages to support his family. Nevertheless, he would like to expand his workshop to be able to increase his workforce.

Translated from French by Patrick Stadelmann, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To expand his metal welding workshop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy five 50-kg sacks of corn, two 50-liter drums of palm oil, and three 25-liter drums of peanut oil

loans.name: Jeanne

texts.fr: Y. Jeanne est née le 26 Mars 1973 à Adjohoun un petit village du Département de l’OUEME dont elle est originaire. Jeanne est mariée à ABLO Bienvenu ; et Jeanne est  mère de trois enfants dont un garçon et deux filles tous scolarisés. Jeanne vit avec sa famille vit à AGBODJEDO, un quartier de Cotonou, Capitale Économique du Bénin. Jeanne vend à domicile de bois de chauffage, de charbon de bois et du maïs en détail. C’est dans les marchés locaux en dehors de la ville de COTONOU que Jeanne s’approvisionne en ces différents produits. C’est le mari de Jeanne qui supporte les charges familiales ; ainsi, Jeanne arrive à mieux développer son activité en y investissant ses revenus. Jeanne a déjà eu trois crédits de ALIDé ; crédits qu’elle a très bien remboursés et avec lesquels elle a pu amener son activité à un stade supérieur. Aujourd’hui encore Jeanne sollicite un quatrième crédit de ALIDé pour augmenter le volume de son activité afin de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle sans cesse croissante.
texts.en:
Y. Jeanne was born on March 26, 1973 in Adjohoun, a small village in OUEME County, to where she traces her roots. She is the mother of three children, a boy and two girls who are all in school. She lives with her family in AGBODJEDO, a district of Cotonou, the economic capital of Benin. Jeanne used to sell firewood, charcoal, and corn retail out of her house. The local marketplaces outside the the city of Cotonou is where she stock up with these different goods. Her husband covers family expenses, so she is managing to improve her business by investing her revenues into it. Jeanne has already had three ALIDÉ loans and has indeed repaid them, having used them to raise her business to a higher level. Again now, she's requesting a fourth loan from ALIDÉ to increase her business volume in order to respond better to the demands of her customers, who are continuously increasing.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a truck-load of firewood, six sacks of charcoal, and two 50-kg sacks of corn

loans.name: Alida

texts.fr: L. Alida est née le 17 Juillet 1975 à Djassin un quartier périphérique de la ville de Porto-Novo, Capitale Administrative et Politique du BENIN; d’où elle est originaire. Alida est mariée à HOUESSOU François un commerçant. Alida est mère de deux enfants dont une fille et un garçon tous scolarisés. Alida vendait des tissus à Dantokpa, grand marché international du Bénin. C’est par manque de moyens financiers conséquents pour asseoir véritablement cette activité de vente de tissus qui a amené Alida à l’abandonner. Depuis quatre (4) ans Alida vend en gros différentes sortes de savons et des sachets toujours à Dantokpa. Alida a déjà bénéficié de trois crédits de la part de ALIDé pour développer son activité. Actuellement, Alida sollicite un quatrième crédit pour continuer de développer son activité afin de fidéliser sa clientèle.
texts.en:
L. Alida was born on July 17, 1975 in Djassin, an outlying district of the city of Porto-Novo, the administrative and political capital of Benin, to where she traces her roots. She is married to HOUESSOU François, a merchant. She is the mother of two children, a girl and a boy who are both in school. Alida used to sell cloth at Dantokpa, the grand international marketplace of Benin. But due to a lack of substantial funding for really establishing this cloth-selling business, she was obliged to abandon it. For four years, she has been selling different kinds of soaps and bags, still at Dantokpa, at the wholesale level. She has already benefited from three loans with ALIDÉ to develop her business. Currently, she's requesting a fourth loan to continue developing her business, in order to earn the loyalty of her customers.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy 20 boxes of soap and three bales of bags

loans.name: Jeannot

texts.fr: Il a son atelier dans le quartier Gadapara de kolda. Il fabrique des lits, des chaises, des armoires et autres objets d'art en bois d'ébéne principalement. Il est célibataire mais soutien de famille et participe à toutes les dépenses grace à son métier.
